import { useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" function Translate() { const [translateParam] = useParams() const [langue, setlangue] = useState("") const [inputLangue, setinputLangue] = useState("") function OnclickTranslate(e) { e.prevendDefault() translateParam = inputLangue } return (
{ setinputLangue(e.target.value) }} />
) } export default Translate
